conbody.p: Before scanning, recheck the patient information (such as name, age, height and weight), study info (such as admission number, scan protocol and patient position) to ensure the correct acquisition according to the preset scheme.

During the setting of scanning parameters, the system will estimate the needed storage space and mark the parameter with red color when the storage space is insufficient. Then modify the scanning parameters according to the prompt. Otherwise, click OK. The system shows a warning prompt

To ensure normal and safe operation of the system, the user is not allowed to install any software without UIH authorization to the operating system of the console. The user is not allowed to connect the equipment to any unauthorized network.

In addition, the user should regularly back up the data in the system. The system will mon-itor the memory of the computer automatically and send a warning message when the memory reaches the threshold. The user needs to archive the data and clear the memory regularly to ensure the smooth scanning.

Unless otherwise permitted by UIH, please do not modify the embedded software system in any form. Please do not install any non-system software (such as games) to the com-puter. The system software has the anti-virus function.

When any failure occurs to the communication with external networks, the system can still run normally. In case of network disconnection when the system is communicating with another device, you are required to reconnect the device and re-perform the relevant data communications after the network recovery.
The system will stop in case of power failure.
When you reboot the system after the power supply recovers, the system will run normally, but any data or information that were unsaved before power failure will be lost.

li.p: It is recommended to anonymize data to be exported from the system for protecting patient health information.
To ensure the security of the system and data, the user can disable data export to USB
Also the user can disable USB completely.

note.p: License mechanism is used to forbid unexpected copy/installation or use. Thirty days before the expiry of the validity period, the system will prompt the corresponding prod-uct is about to expire. Users should timely contact service engineer to ensure the sus-tainable use of the product renewal. Users can also view the current application expiration date through the license information provided by the system.

li.p: While examining a patient, the operator is prohibited to plug/unplug USB. Otherwise, the system may encounter image information errors
While the system is running, the user shall not intentionally disconnect the power and network. Otherwise, there will be data loss.
Due to technological limits, there is a risk of patient information loss on the backup media
